name: Comet Rocket - GDKO 2023 - Round 1
description:
In the vast emptiness of space there isn't much, except for a small blue galaxy out in the middle of nowhere. In this Galaxy many aliens reside and live freely. That is until someone else came along. Crashing on an icy comet and breaking their ship into pieces, this marooned astronaut fashioned the remaining parts into a sort of Comet Rocket. With his new found means of transport, our hero must explore this new environment, and talk to aliens.

Controls:

A/D - Player Left / Right
W/Space - Jump
Arrow Keys - Planet Movement
E - Interact With NPCS

Assets:
All Assets were made by me accept for the music
Music - https://freesound.org/people/Drakensson/sounds/547029/

Tips:

To talk with npcs get your player character as close as possible to the npc and press E
